message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $18,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you, even at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $16,500. I believe this offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to consider $15,500 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
